nodes.title: Freshers Week Flashback
nodes.story: It's 2 AM after a freshers' week party. You're tipsy, scrolling Insta when your ex's story pops up: them at Zambezi Lounge with your mutual friends. The caption: 'Miss the old squad.' A WhatsApp notification follows: 'Saw you at the braai today. You looked good. Still thinking about us?'

choices.text: Leave on read and block them
Reply: 'You looked good too. Drinks this weekend?'

nodes.title: Kwaito Night Out
nodes.story: Friday at Kong in Braamfontein. Amapiano beats thump as your ex buys you tequila shots. 'Remember our first year?' they whisper, hand on your thigh. 'Your room in res, my fake ID?' They're wearing the cologne you bought them. Your roommate texts: 'Don't do it bruh.'

choices.text: Finish your drink and Uber home alone
Take them back to your digs
Make out in the club bathroom

nodes.title: Residence Room Regret
nodes.story: In your single room res, vodka and nostalgia mix. Their hands undo your jeans. 'I've missed this,' they moan. Your roommate bangs on the door: 'Yo, you okay?' On their phone, a Tinder notification flashes: '5 new matches.' You're just another swipe.

choices.text: Kick them out, cry yourself to sleep

nodes.title: Morning After Group Chat
nodes.story: You wake up to them still in your bed. Their phone buzzes non-stop. Your WhatsApp group explodes: 'Saw you leave with your ex!??' 'Bruh, they're dating Siphosethu from law faculty!' A photo circulates: them kissing someone else last week. Your ex wakes up: 'Morning baby. What's for breakfast?'

choices.text: Pack their things, throw them out

nodes.title: Toxic Semester
nodes.story: You become their situationship. They text at 2 AM for booty calls. Post you on Snapchat but never Instagram official. Your friends stage an intervention at KFC. 'They're using you for accommodation and... you know.' Your ex texts: 'My place or yours? My roommate's away.'

nodes.title: The Ultimate Humiliation
nodes.story: You arrive with wine. Their roommate IS there - with Siphosethu. All three laugh. 'The bet was you'd come back three times!' they snicker. Your ex records your reaction. 'For TikTok!' The video gets 50k views by morning. Campus security escorts you from their res after you break a window.

choices.endingText: You finish your degree at a different university. The TikTok video becomes campus legend. You learn to trust your instincts next time.

nodes.title: Healing Semester
nodes.story: Therapy through Student Wellness. Gym membership. New friend group from your accounting class. Six months later, you see your ex failing a module retake. They try to wave. You're with your new partner, holding hands during rag procession. You don't look back.

choices.endingText: You graduate summa cum laude, land a grad job in Sandton. Your ex drops out. Karma delivered via academic transcript.
